release_note: Made the app easier to share with friends and added support for more languages.
A lot of bugfixes and improvements. Added support for multiple languages. I hope that the translations are good. If you have any suggestions feel free to send an email to support limeware.io
Improved some features and made some design changes. I hope you ll like it!
Improved contact us screen. Have a nice weekend! :
